channel.title: Use the function JSON_EXTRACT
channel.description:
Hello, I made one query in redash, before i running this query, i running in mysql 5.7 using de Sequel.Pro and the query running correcty. But in redash is shown this error = Error running query: **execute command denied to user 'redash'@'%' for routine 'core.json_extract'**. The query is :
``` SELECT json_extract(`businessExternalData`,'$.properties') `mail`, revokedAt `Revoked Date`, provider FROM connect_oauth WHERE businessId IS NULL AND revokedId IS NULL AND status = 'revoked' AND revokedAt IS NOT NULL AND businessExternalData IS NOT NULL ORDER BY updatedAt DESC ; ```

item.title: Use the function JSON_EXTRACT
item.dc:creator: GabriellaStaniecki
item.description:
Hello, I made one query in redash, before i running this query, i running in mysql 5.7 using de Sequel.Pro and the query running correcty. But in redash is shown this error = Error running query: execute command denied to user ‘redash’@‘%’ for routine ‘core.json_extract’.
The query is :

SELECT json_extract(`businessExternalData`,'$.properties') `mail`,
       revokedAt `Revoked Date`,
       provider
FROM connect_oauth
WHERE businessId IS NULL
  AND revokedId IS NULL
  AND status = 'revoked'
  AND revokedAt IS NOT NULL
  AND businessExternalData IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY updatedAt DESC ;

Read full topic
